thread.title: Chelsea defender Baba Rahman faces lengthy injury spell after being carried off on Africa Cup of Nations duty
thread.title_full: Chelsea defender Baba Rahman faces lengthy injury spell after being carried off on Africa Cup of Nations duty

author: tgannon
title: Chelsea defender Baba Rahman faces lengthy injury spell after being carried off on Africa Cup of Nations duty
text:
EFL Baba's Ghan Chelsea defender Baba Rahman faces lengthy injury spell after being carried off on Africa Cup of Nations duty 
Blues star, who is on loan at Schalke, had to be taken off on a stretcher during Ghana's 1-0 win over Uganda By TOBY GANNON Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CHELSEA defender Baba Rahman faces a lengthy spell on the sidelines after injuring himself at the African Nations Cup. 
Ghana star Rahman – who is currently on loan at Schalke – was forced off in the first half of Tuesday’s 1-0 win over Uganda after sustaining a serious-looking knee crock. Getty Images Baba Rahman was carried off on a stretcher during Ghana’s win over Uganda 
He has now left his side’s base in Port Gentil to travel to Germany for treatment. 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport’s daily LIVE blog 
A statement from the Ghana FA confirmed the 22-year-old will “undergo further tests and possible surgery”. 
Tests in Gabon’s capital Libreville on Wednesday confirmed that Baba had suffered “a rupture of the meniscus and a particular tear of the anterior cruciate ligament with fluid collection in the left knee.” Related Stories Diego Costa beams in cheesy team photo as he puts furious training bust-up behind him COURT OUT Thibaut Courtois tells pals he's up for Real Madrid switch after Los Blancos give up chase for David De Gea DOUBLE BUBBLES West Ham to double Chelsea target Michail Antonio's wages to £70k-a-week in a bid to tie down winger He'll Costa lot Diego Costa warns Chelsea to 'pay him what he's worth' as he demands £300k-a-week to stay at club unfinished business Boro complete the signing of striker Patrick Bamford on a four-and-a-half-year deal Corbis The Ghana defender signed for Chelsea on a five-year deal until 2020 Getty Images Baba Rahman is currently playing for Schalke after signing for the Germans on loan Getty Images 4 Baba Rahman has had to travel back to Germany for further tests to his injury 
West Ham star Andre Ayew scored the winner for the Black Stars to send them top of Group D. 
Rahman signed for Chelsea in a £21.7million deal from Augsburg in August 2015. 
The full-back made 23 appearances for the Blues last term but joined Schalke on a season-long loan in the summer. 
Rahman’s Stamford Bridge contract expires in August 2020.
